content.about: Kitchener Antique Appraisals provides professional antique appraisal services in the Kitchener area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Patricia M.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

reviews.author: Michael J.
reviews.content: Good service overall, though the turnaround time for my antique appraisal was longer than expected.

reviews.author: James R.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend them for any antique appraisal needs.

reviews.author: Elizabeth M.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

content.about: Heritage Valuations Kitchener provides professional antique appraisal services in the Kitchener area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Jennifer W.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.author: Nancy J.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. Heritage Valuations Kitchener's expertise with my antique pocket watch collection was impressive.

reviews.author: Susan W.
reviews.content: Professional service with good attention to detail, but would have appreciated more explanation about my antique furniture valuation methodology.

reviews.author: Susan M.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend Heritage Valuations Kitchener for any antique appraisal needs.

reviews.author: Patricia J.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of antique furniture values was exceptional. The documentation they provided was detailed and perfect for my insurance needs.
